movie.title: Cotton Comes to Harlem
movie.description_intro: Gravedigger Jones and Coffin Ed Johnson are two black cops with a reputation for breaking the odd head. Both are annoyed at the success of the Reverend Deke O'Mailey who is selling trips back to Africa to the poor on the installment plan. When his truck is hijacked and a bale of cotton stuffed with money is lost in the chase, Harlem is turned upside down by Gravedigger and Coffin Ed, the Reverend, and the hijackers. Much of the humor is urban black, which was unusual in 1970.
movie.description_full: Gravedigger Jones and Coffin Ed Johnson are two black cops with a reputation for breaking the odd head. Much of the humor is urban black, which was unusual in 1970.

movies.title: Hide
movies.summary: A Boston detective investigates the mummified remains of six women, based on a novel by Lisa Gardner.
movies.description_full: A Boston detective investigates the mummified remains of six women, based on a novel by Lisa Gardner.

movies.title: My Gift: A Christmas Special from Carrie Underwood
movies.title_english: My Gift: A Christmas Special from Carrie Underwood
movies.title_long: My Gift: A Christmas Special from Carrie Underwood (2020)
movies.summary: A Christmas special with beloved 7-time Grammy-Award winning singer Carrie Underwood, debuting her first-ever chart topping Christmas album, "My Gift". Produced by Academy Award-winning Tom Hanks and Emmy Award-winning Gary Goetzman.
movies.description_full: A Christmas special with beloved 7-time Grammy-Award winning singer Carrie Underwood, debuting her first-ever chart topping Christmas album, "My Gift". Produced by Academy Award-winning Tom Hanks and Emmy Award-winning Gary Goetzman.
movies.synopsis: A Christmas special with beloved 7-time Grammy-Award winning singer Carrie Underwood, debuting her first-ever chart topping Christmas album, "My Gift". Produced by Academy Award-winning Tom Hanks and Emmy Award-winning Gary Goetzman.

movies.title: The Serpent
movies.summary: Top special agent Lucinda Kavsky works for a secret part of the CIA. She's given a special assignment but then set up by her own agency.
movies.description_full: Top special agent Lucinda Kavsky works for a secret part of the CIA. She's given a special assignment but then set up by her own agency.
movies.synopsis: Top special agent Lucinda Kavsky works for a secret part of the CIA. She's given a special assignment but then set up by her own agency.

movies.title: Penance
movies.summary: Father Eion O'Donnell is unambiguous about the need to use violence to force Britain out of Ireland. He influences a young impressionable boy, Antaine to fight in the 1916 Rising. Fifty years later Antaine arrives in Derry as an experienced gunman. This appearance throws Eoin back to the cause of his breakdown in 1916. Eoin's influence on young Antaine echoes in Antaine's dark influence on an Altar boy, Feidhlim.
